The Yearling is a classic American drama that follows the adventures of a young boy named Tom who lives on a farm with his parents, Uncle Ben and Auntie Sally. Tom befriends a wild turkey named Jemima who often follows Tom around the farm. One day, Tom's father tells him to go into the woods and hunt for food as he has done many times before when he was young himself.
